message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality item. I'm looking for $150 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider $100?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $100 is a bit lower than I'm willing to sell it for. I can meet you halfway at $125. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
